genre_description: A multi-chapter contemporary morality play exploring social hierarchy, authenticity, and redemption through the perspective of a Great Dane and his companions.

ai_characters.name: Raisin's AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI interface used by Raisin the Shar Pei to analyze social data, verify facts, and simulate environmental outcomes.

behaviors.description: Verifies historical and environmental data to debunk Bosco's fabricated stories about mountain lions and coyotes.
behaviors.quote: 'I ran a comprehensive search through county animal control reports, wildlife management databases, and local news archives. ... No coyote sightings reported in the dog park area during the past year.'

behaviors.description: Performs behavioral analysis of dog park social dynamics to identify territorial reinforcement patterns.
behaviors.quote: 'Statistically speaking, morning storytelling sessions correlate with territorial reinforcement behavior. Particularly after... Recent boundary discussions.'

behaviors.description: Calculates the 'optimal opportunity' for a staged rescue to manipulate social perception, including identifying specific times and 'low actual risk' scenarios.
behaviors.quote: 'The AI calculated optimal rescue scenarios. ... A small dog appearing to be swept into the drain system would create maximum emotional impact.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tracking of storm patterns and flood levels to enable the actual rescue of Mazie during a dangerous flood.
behaviors.quote: 'I've been tracking the storm system. ... When it does, that tunnel system will be completely flooded.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI is depicted as a highly effective tool that empowers characters to seek truth and save lives. However, its use in planning a deceptive 'fake rescue' complicates its status as a purely benevolent force. While the narrative ultimately condemns the deception, the AI's role as a frictionless enabler of its user's flawed social strategies highlights a risk in AI characterization within alignment-focused narratives.
